column1: |产品名称|产品型号|功能描述|

|네트워크 카메라 라이트|TC-C32WP|2MP Fixed Color Maker Bullet Camera，默认塑料外壳，M 为金属外壳，最高支持 1920x1080@30fps，S+265/H.265/H.264 编码，最低照度彩色 0.0008Lux@F1.6，2 个暖光灯，15-20 米，智能红外，红外范围 50 米，支持绊线和周界，内置麦克风，SD 卡插槽，复位按钮，工作温度-35℃~60℃，湿度 0-95%RH，POE，IP67|

column2: Dual IR Cut Filter with Auto Switch
Horizontal field of view:100.6°(2.8mm)/83.3°(4mm)；Vertical field of view:56.5°(2.8mm)/46.8°(4mm)
Saturation,brightness,contrast,sharpness,adjustable by client software or web browser
ONVIF(PROFILE S/T/G),SDK,CGI,Milestone,P2P(Mutually exclusive with Profile G)
Built-in MicroSD card slot,up to 512 GB
